mapper.select: SELECT IMAGE_ID AS id, '메인 배너' AS title, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, '#' AS linkUrl FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE IS_THUMBNAIL = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY SORT_ORDER, IMAGE_ID
SELECT DISTINCT SELLER_ID AS id, SELLER_ID AS name, '직거래 전문 업체' AS description, '/resources/img/main/default-logo.png' AS logoUrl FROM PRODUCT WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, '임시 카테고리' AS category, P.PNAME AS name, P.PRICE AS price FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'SELLING' AND ROWNUM <= 4 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
